Robotics.prerequisites: BS/MS in engineering/CS/math; strong in mechanics, programming, control systems.
Robotics.coursework: 33-84 credits: Core (robotics foundations, AI/ML, mechatronics); electives (autonomous systems, human-robot interaction). GPA 3.5+.
Robotics.thesis: Original dissertation (14+ credits); defense; publishable research.

Bioengineering.prerequisites: BS in bio/chem/phys eng; math/physics/chem labs.
Bioengineering.coursework: 30-60 credits: Bio fundamentals, biomaterials, biomechanics; quant methods (math/stats).
Bioengineering.thesis: 30+ research credits; novel bio-device/app; peer-reviewed pubs.

Electrical Engineering.prerequisites: BS in EE/CS; circuits, signals, programming.
Electrical Engineering.coursework: 18-96 credits: EE core (signals, circuits, electromagnetics); 9+ in specialization (e.g., quantum electronics).
Electrical Engineering.thesis: Original EE innovation; 27+ dissertation credits; defense.

Neuroscience.coursework: Core: Cellular/molecular neurobio, neuropharm, stats; electives (comp neuro, imaging).

Quantum Physics.prerequisites: BS/MS in physics/math; quantum mechanics, linear algebra.
Quantum Physics.coursework: Core: Quantum info, optics, computation; electives (QIS, entanglement). 48+ credits.

Ancient History.prerequisites: BA in history/classics; 3+ years Latin/Greek; other ancient lang.
Ancient History.coursework: 72+ units: Greco-Roman/Near East history, philology, archaeology.
Ancient History.thesis: Original monograph on ancient societies; defense.

Biotechnology.prerequisites: BS in bio/chem/eng; org chem, bio labs; GPA 3.0+.
Biotechnology.coursework: 30-48 credits: Biotech core (genomics, bioprocess, ethics); quant bio.

Creative Writing (Poetry).prerequisites: MA/MFA in English/CW; portfolio; foreign lang optional.
Creative Writing (Poetry).coursework: 36-90 credits: CW workshops, lit theory, poetics; minor in lit.
Creative Writing (Poetry).thesis: Creative dissertation (poem collection + critical essay); defense.

Computer Science.prerequisites: BS/MS in CS/math; programming, algorithms, discrete math.
Computer Science.coursework: 24-96 credits: Core (OS, AI, theory); specializations below.

specializations.Carbon: Interop/migration courses; C++ perf; experimental lang design.
specializations.Rust: Systems prog, concurrency, memory safety; kernel dev.
specializations.Mangle: Deductive DBs, querying; data dedup in AI/OS.
